text:
Anyone familiar with using ArchGDAL WKT? It's failing for this string "01010000000972AB7BBFD953C00B22F719BCD24540"

ArchGDAL.fromWKT(s)

fromWKB errors as well

elements.text:
Anyone familiar with using ArchGDAL WKT? It's failing for this string "01010000000972AB7BBFD953C00B22F719BCD24540"

ArchGDAL.fromWKT(s)

fromWKB errors as well

text:
```julia> ArchGDAL.fromWKT(s)
ERROR: Failed to create geometry from WKT
Stacktrace:
 [1] error(s::String)
   @ Base ./error.jl:33
 [2] macro expansion
   @ ~/.julia/packages/ArchGDAL/j9NPL/src/utils.jl:14 [inlined]
 [3] fromWKT(data::Vector{String})
   @ ArchGDAL ~/.julia/packages/ArchGDAL/j9NPL/src/ogr/geometry.jl:53
 [4] fromWKT(::String)
   @ ArchGDAL ~/.julia/packages/ArchGDAL/j9NPL/src/ogr/geometry.jl:68
 [5] top-level scope
   @ REPL[82]:1

julia> ArchGDAL.fromWKB(s)
ERROR: GDALError (CE_Failure, code 6):
        Unsupported WKB type 825241904

Stacktrace:
 [1] gdaljl_errorhandler(class::GDAL.CPLErr, errno::Int32, errmsg::Cstring)
   @ GDAL ~/.julia/packages/GDAL/Yh4fH/src/error.jl:36
 [2] macro expansion
   @ ~/.julia/packages/ArchGDAL/j9NPL/src/utils.jl:8 [inlined]
 [3] fromWKB(data::String)
   @ ArchGDAL ~/.julia/packages/ArchGDAL/j9NPL/src/ogr/geometry.jl:13
 [4] top-level scope
   @ REPL[83]:1```
